HOW TO USE OCUFLOW APP:

1. Connect your Ocuflow unit to your computer via the provided USB cable.
2. Double click on the “Ocuflow App” icon in this same folder.


TROUBLESHOOTING:

- If you encounter any issues while using the Ocuflow App application, simply unplug your Ocuflow unit, plug it back in, then close and reopen Ocuflow App.

***Do NOT edit any of the other files found in this folder. It may cause the Ocuflow App to break.***
